story.title: WHO WE ARE
story.content1: The Good News is a digital media platform founded by Mariam Naoum in 2020. We are dedicated to sharing positive stories, highlighting inspiring individuals, and fostering a community centered around hope and optimism.
story.content2: Mariam is a media professional with over 7 years of experience, a graduate of TV journalism, and a certified digital journalist from the European Commission in Belgium and the Arab Youth Center in the UAE. She previously worked as a Public Communications Lead at climate conferences COP27, COP28, and COP29.
story.content3: From everyday heroes changing our lives, to creative initiatives and stories of social impact — The Good News exists to always remind you that there is still goodness and positive news waiting to be told.
story.missionContent: Our mission is to transform the media landscape by focusing on stories that celebrate human achievement, kindness, and progress. In a world often dominated by negative news, we strive to provide a balanced perspective by showcasing the good that exists all around us. We believe that positive journalism can inspire action, foster connection, and contribute to a more hopeful society.
